title: Need to Move Now?   CALL  Jeff for a list of New Apartments!
neighborhood: Lodo, Ballpark, Downtown, cherry creek, highlands, lohi
posting_body: Hey there - -Jeff here with Rental Friends.
Looking for a good deal downtown or in Virginia Village?
there are some really good deals going on right now on luxury apartments/lofts.
Give me a ring to tour some properties - - I know the area, the buildings, the restaurants - - give me a ring!
Pics are of a couple of available communities - - they are of the models - but the finishes are the same!
